availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: B. F. Trumbo (Bath County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew Trumbo and Eloise Trumbo. Married to Eliza Taylor in Bath County, Kentucky on October 18, 1860. Clerk in Bath County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Bath County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 2, p. 2B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film #000273007, p. 111.
KYR-0001-004-0350.
